summary_of_the_change: Contract term extended from 24 to 36 months, cure period for breach extended from 15 to 30 days, and notice period for termination for convenience extended from 60 to 90 days (Sec. 2.1, 2.2, 2.3).
Monthly fee increased from $15,000 to $18,000 and late payment interest rate increased from 1.5% to 2.0% (Sec. 3.1, 3.2).
Liability cap increased from three months to six months of fees paid (Sec. 6.2).
